org.fluidity.foundation

Class Archives.Nested

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fluidity.foundation.Utility
      • org.fluidity.foundation.Archives.Nested
  • Enclosing class:
    Archives

    public static final class Archives.Nested
extends Utility
    Convenience methods to handle nested Java archives.

    Usage

     for (final URL url : Archives.Nested.dependencies(true, "widgets")) {

     // make sure to select only those archives that have the
     // mandatory "Widget-Name" manifest attribute
     if (Archives.attributes(url, "Widget-Name")[0] != null) {
         …
     }
 }

      The path component delimiter in a valid embedded JAR URL.

        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • formatURL

        public static URL formatURL(URL root,
                            String... path)
                     throws IOException
        Creates a URL to a resources in a JAR archive nested in other JAR archives at any level.
        Parameters:
        root - the URL of the (possibly already nested) JAR archive.
        path - the list of entry names within the preceding archive entry in the list, or the root archive in case of the first path; may be empty, in which case the root URL is returned. If the last item is null, the returned URL will point to a nested archive; if the last item is not null, the returned URL will point to a JAR resource inside a (potentially nested) archive.
        Returns:
        a jarjar: pointing either to a nested archive, or a JAR resource within a nested archive.
        Throws:
        IOException - when URL handling fails.

      • nestedURL

        public static URL nestedURL(URL archive)
                     throws IOException
        Takes a JAR resource URL that happens to point to a nested archive, say jar:file:/tmp/archive.jar!/nested.jar, and converts that URL to a nested archive URL pointing to the same resource that can be used to access the contents of that nested archive.
        Parameters:
        archive - the JAR resource URL of the (possibly already nested) JAR archive.
        Returns:
        a jarjar: pointing either to a nested archive, or a JAR resource within a nested archive.
        Throws:
        IOException - when URL handling fails.

      • rootURL

        public static URL rootURL(URL url)
                   throws IOException
        Returns the root URL of the given URL returned by a previous call to formatURL(). The returned URL can then be fed back to formatURL() to target other nested Java archives.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL to return the root of.
        Returns:
        the root URL, which may be the given url; never null.
        Throws:
        IOException - when processing the URL fails.

      • attribute

        public static String attribute(String name)
        Returns the JAR manifest attribute listing the embedded dependency paths for the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the dependency list; may be null
        Returns:
        the JAR manifest entry listing the embedded dependency paths for the given name.

      • dependencies

        public static Collection<URL> dependencies(boolean cached,
                                           String name)
                                    throws IOException
        Returns the list of URLs pointing to the named list of embedded archives. The returned URLs can then be extended with further nested archives or resources using the formatURL method.

        The caller must have the RuntimePermission "getClassLoader" permission.

        Parameters:
        cached - tells whether a previously cached archive, if any, should be used (true), or a newly loaded one (false).
        name - the name of the dependency list; may be null
        Returns:
        the list of URLs pointing to the named list of embedded archives; may be empty.
        Throws:
        IOException - when I/O error occurs when accessing the archive.

      • dependencies

        public static Collection<URL> dependencies(boolean cached,
                                           URL archive,
                                           String name)
                                    throws IOException
        Returns the list of URLs pointing to the named list of embedded archives. The returned URLs can then be appended further nested archives or resources using the formatURL method.
        Parameters:
        cached - tells whether a previously cached archive, if any, should be used (true), or a newly loaded one (false).
        archive - the URL to the Java archive to inspect
        name - the name of the dependency list; may be null
        Returns:
        the list of URLs pointing to the named list of embedded archives; may be empty.
        Throws:
        IOException - when I/O error occurs when accessing the archive.

      • list

        public static String[] list(boolean cached)
                     throws IOException
        Returns the list of custom nested dependency names in the given archive. The returned names can then be fed to dependencies(boolean, String).

        The caller must have the RuntimePermission "getClassLoader" permission.

        Parameters:
        cached - tells whether a previously cached archive, if any, should be used (true), or a newly loaded one (false).
        Returns:
        a possibly empty list of nested dependencies; never null.
        Throws:
        IOException - when reading the archive fails.

      • list

        public static String[] list(URL archive,
                            boolean cached)
                     throws IOException
        Returns the list of custom nested dependency names in the given archive. The returned names can then be fed to dependencies(boolean, URL, String).
        Parameters:
        archive - the archive to look for nested dependencies in.
        cached - tells whether a previously cached archive, if any, should be used (true), or a newly loaded one (false).
        Returns:
        a possibly empty list of nested dependencies; never null.
        Throws:
        IOException - when reading the archive fails.

      • list

        public static String[] list(Manifest manifest)
        Returns the list of custom nested dependency names in the given archive. The returned names can then be fed to dependencies(boolean, URL, String).
        Parameters:
        manifest - the manifest entries to check for nested dependency headers.
        Returns:
        a possibly empty list of nested dependencies; never null.
